      • hatpull

        public static Object hatpull(int[] amountOfEach,
                             Object[] elements)
        Runs a virtual hat pull. Format:
        amountOgEach = {p1Amount, p2Amount, ...}
        elements = {p1, p2, ...}
        Note: This functions runs System.gc() after it's done.
        Parameters:
        amountOfEach -
        elements -
        Returns:
